markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Bonuwat Wavetouched](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=96)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Mwangi Expanse

</column>

You are a child of the Bonuwat people, and the sea’s salt flows through your veins. You’ve taken to sailing and swimming gracefully and with ease, earning you the honorific “wavetouched.”

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, and the [Ocean Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Underwater Marauder](/Feats.aspx?ID=858) skill feat.
name: Bonuwat Wavetouched

summary_markdown: You are a child of the Bonuwat people, and the sea’s salt flows through your veins. You’ve taken to sailing and swimming gracefully and with ease, …
text: Bonuwat Wavetouched Source World Guide pg. 94 2.0 Region Mwangi Expanse You are a child of the Bonuwat people, and the sea’s salt flows through your veins. You’ve taken to sailing and swimming gracefully and with ease, earning you the honorific “wavetouched.” Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Athletics skill, and the Ocean Lore skill. You gain the Underwater Marauder skill feat.
